thought: To craft a mossy_cobblestone_wall, I need to craft 6 mossy_cobblestones. To do so, I will need to place 1 cobblestone and 1 vine in the crafting table. Therefore, I will first move the cobblestone from slot 15 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1
